issue.title: [R] Allow Scanner$create() to accept filter / project even with arrow_dplyr_querys
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13560](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13560). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, when calling `Scanner$create()` on an `arrow_dplyr_query` the `projection` and `filter` arguments are ignored silently (since the dplyr query filters should be applied). 

This is helpful for predicate pushdowns 

One proposal is at https://gist.github.com/hannesmuehleisen/61d655bb345e0af374d10ca303894eef
